Name: Business
Description: Field of study that deals with the principles of business, management, and economics. It combines elements of accountancy, finance, marketing, organizational studies, human resource management, and operations.

Name: Sales
Description: Sales course covers a wide range of topics essential for developing effective selling skills. These include understanding the sales process, prospecting and lead generation, and building customer relationships.

Name: Marketing
Description: An examination of managerial decision-making and problem-solving using the marketing mix and the activities it entails such as selling, advertising, pricing, consumer behavior, marketing research and channels of distribution.

Name: Computer science
Description: The course is designed to teach the theoretical and practical aspects of computing, including programming, algorithms, data structures, software development, and computer systems.

Name: Hospitality
Description: Hospitality, culinary arts, catering, events, human resources, marketing, sales, and finance.

Name: Arts
Description: Combines a mixture of theoretical and practical course elements to nurture students in developing their own artistic work.
